language.header: You selected this language for app and chat:
language.hint: Tap a flag and confirm with Back.
welcome.headlineDefaultSuffix: Stories for eternity – told by you
welcome.headlineAltSuffix: Your stories, thoughts and values remain
welcome.rotate1:
People don't disappear.
They live on – in our memories.
And in the way we tell them.
welcome.rotate2:
Create your own immortal avatar.
In just 5 minutes, your heart touches eternity – today, tomorrow and forever.
welcome.rotate3: All it takes is a picture or video of you, a short voice recording, and a few memories that matter to you.
welcome.ctaSubtext: Looks like you, speaks and tells like you
avatars.errorIndexMissing: Firestore index missing. Run: firebase deploy --only firestore:indexes
avatars.title: My Avatars
avatars.emptySubtitle: Create your first avatar and start a special conversation
